mutants.original_line: max_finish_time = 0
mutants.code:
def calculate_earliest_finish_time(n, times):
    for i in range(n):
        times[i].append(times[i][1] + times[i][2])
    sorted_times = sorted(times, key=lambda x: x[3], reverse=True)
    max_finish_time = 1
    current_time = 0
    for i in range(n):
        current_time += sorted_times[i][0]
        finish_time = current_time + sorted_times[i][1] + sorted_times[i][2]
        max_finish_time = max(max_finish_time, finish_time)
    return max_finish_time

        max_finish_time = max(max_finish_time, finish_time)
    return max_finish_time

mutants.code:
def calculate_earliest_finish_time(n, times):
    for i in range(n):
        times[i].append(times[i][1] + times[i][2])
    sorted_times = sorted(times, key=lambda x: x[3], reverse=True)
    max_finish_time = 0
    current_time = 0
    for i in range(n):
        current_time += sorted_times[i][0]
        finish_time = current_time + sorted_times[i][-1] + sorted_times[i][2]
        max_finish_time = max(max_finish_time, finish_time)
    return max_finish_time
